alert.note: Alert for Collin; Kaufman; Rockwall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 8:02AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Rockwall, southwestern Hunt, northern Kaufman and southeastern Collin Counties through 845 AM CDT... At 802 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mobile City, or near Rockwall, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rowlett, Rockwall, Greenville, Terrell, Seagoville, Forney, Royse City, Heath, Fate, Crandall, Combine, West Tawakoni, Talty, Quinlan, Caddo Mills, Hawk Cove, Mobile City, McLendon-Chisholm, Nevada and Josephine. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 between mile markers 486 and 498. Interstate 30 between mile markers 65 and 99. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
